thread.title: Man's body found in city centre river - Manchester Evening News
thread.title_full: Man's body found in city centre river - Manchester Evening News

author: Alexandra Rucki
title: Man's body found in city centre river - Manchester Evening News
text:
News Man's body found in city centre river Police and the fire service were called to a section of the river, on Oxford Road, in the city centre, on Wednesday Share Oxford Road, Manchester (Photo: Mark Waugh) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A man’s body has been found in the River Medlock. 
Police and the fire service were called to a section of the river, on Oxford Road, in the city centre, on Wednesday. 
Specialist officers searched the river and later discovered the body of the man. Read More 
Greater Manchester Police are making enquiries to discover the circumstances behind the man’s death. 
His age and identity are unknown at this stage. 
Police are appealing for anyone with further information to get in touch. Read More 
Anyone with information should contact police on 101 quoting reference number 1556 of 22/02/17. 
Alternatively call the independent charity Crimestoppers, anonymously, on 0800 555 111. Like us on Facebook
